    • Method Detail

      • checkPhase

        PhaseStatus checkPhase(Exercise exercise,
                       boolean continuePhase)
        Checks if the given code in the exercise is valid or not for the current phase
        Parameters:
        exercise - The Exercise to check
        continuePhase - if the phase manager should continue to the next phase if the Exercise is valid
        Returns:
        a PhaseStatus which contains if the Phase is valid and the ExecutionResult

      • getPhase

        Phase getPhase()
        Returns:
        returns the current Phase
